submissionTerms.title: Términos de Presentación de la Oferta
submissionTerms.description: Information about the submission terms to describe how, when and where the tenderers need to submit their bids or expressions of interest for the procedure.

submissionTerms.title: Términos de Presentación de la Oferta
submissionTerms.description: Information about the submission terms to describe how, when and where the tenderers need to submit their bids or expressions of interest for the lot.

SubmissionTerms.title: Términos de Presentación de la Oferta
SubmissionTerms.description: Information about the submission terms to describe how, when and where the tenderers need to submit their bids or expressions of interest.

electronicSubmissionPolicy.title: Política de presentación de oferta electrónica
electronicSubmissionPolicy.description: Whether tenderers are required, allowed or not allowed to submit bids or expressions of interest electronically.

variantPolicy.title: Política de variantes
variantPolicy.description: Si se exige, se permite o no se permite a los licitantes presentar ofertas que satisfagan las necesidades del comprador de forma diferente a la propuesta en los documentos de contratación.

electronicCatalogPolicy.title: Electronic catalog policy
electronicCatalogPolicy.description: Whether tenderers are required, allowed or not allowed to submit bids as electronic catalogs. An electronic catalog is an electronic format (typically prescribed by the buyer) that participants in the contracting process need to follow when exchanging information about technical specifications, evaluation criteria, bids, lots, etc.

languages.title: Idioma de Presentación de la Oferta
languages.description: One or more languages in which bids or expressions of interest can be submitted, using either two-letter [ISO639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes), or extended [BCP47 language tags](http://www.w3.org/International/articles/language-tags/). The use of lowercase two-letter codes from [ISO639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes) is recommended.

bidValidityPeriod.title: Período de validez de la oferta
bidValidityPeriod.description: El período, desde la fecha límite de presentación de ofertas, durante el cual las ofertas deben seguir siendo válidas.

depositsGuarantees.title: Depósitos y garantías
depositsGuarantees.description: Información sobre los depósitos o garantías exigidas a los oferentes.

advancedElectronicSignatureRequired.title: Advanced electronic signature required
advancedElectronicSignatureRequired.description: Whether an advanced or qualified electronic signature or seal is needed.

multipleBidsAllowed.title: Multiple bids allowed
multipleBidsAllowed.description: Whether tenderers can submit more than one bid.

subcontractingClauses.title: Subcontracting clauses
subcontractingClauses.description: The information about subcontracting that needs to be provided in the bid.

rationale.title: Rationale
rationale.description: The rationale for electronic submission not being allowed.

address.title: Dirección
address.description: The address to which non-electronic bids or expressions of interest should be submitted.
